name: Generic Shooter Game
description:
A generic shooter game for ludum dare 45.

Yeah.... let's just say we had some complications during the jam, so the game is really just a barebones shooter. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

At least we tried to make music for the first time. We hope it isn't to annoying.

You start with nothing and have to collect the guns that spawn, each collected gun gives you a small stat boost. The enemies get stronger as time passes, so you should collect all the guns.

Minimap:

White - Border

Red - Enemies

Green - You

Yellow - Guns to collect

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Ctrl - Dash

Left Click - Shoot

Point to Aim
